changeSet.createView: SELECT client_id, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_medium' AS utm_medium, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_source' AS utm_source, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_content' AS utm_content, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_campaign' AS utm_campaign, metadata->'utm'->>'utm_term' AS utm_term, browser_id, event_datetime, (metadata->'device'->'screen'->>'width') || 'x' || (metadata->'device'->'screen'->>'height') AS viewport, CASE WHEN (metadata->'device'->>'is_phone')::boolean THEN 'phone' WHEN (metadata->'device'->>'is_tablet')::boolean THEN 'tablet' ELSE 'desktop' END AS device, metadata->'device'->>'is_mobile' AS is_mobile, (metadata->'locale'->>'lang') || '-' || (metadata->'locale'->>'country') AS lang, metadata->'browser'->>'os' AS os, metadata->'browser'->>'browser' AS os, COALESCE(metadata->'location'->'address'->>'city', metadata->'locationUserInfo'->'city'->>'name') AS city, CASE WHEN metadata->'location'->'address'->>'city' = metadata->'locationUserInfo'->'city'->>'name' THEN NULL WHEN metadata->'location'->'address'->>'city' IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE metadata->'locationUserInfo'->'city'->>'name' END AS city_alt, COALESCE(metadata->'location'->'address'->>'country', metadata->'locationUserInfo'->'country'->>'name') AS country, metadata->'locationUserInfo'->>'ip_address' AS ip_address, NULLIF(metadata->'current_session'->>'referrer', '') AS referrer FROM sessions ORDER BY event_datetime DESC;

SELECT s.client_id, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_medium' AS utm_medium, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_source' AS utm_source, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_campaign' AS utm_campaign, e.session_id, e.event_datetime, e.metadata->>'id' AS id, e.metadata->>'type' AS type FROM events AS e INNER JOIN sessions AS s ON e.session_id = s.id ORDER BY e.event_datetime DESC;

SELECT s.client_id, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_medium' AS utm_medium, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_source' AS utm_source, s.metadata->'utm'->>'utm_campaign' AS utm_campaign, t.session_id, t.event_datetime, (t.metadata->>'banner')::real / 1000 AS banner, (t.metadata->>'services')::real / 1000 AS services, (t.metadata->>'process')::real / 1000 AS process, (t.metadata->>'technologies')::real / 1000 AS technologies, (t.metadata->>'about')::real / 1000 AS about, (t.metadata->>'testimony')::real / 1000 AS testimony, (t.metadata->>'form')::real / 1000 AS form, (t.metadata->>'footer')::real / 1000 AS footer FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (session_id) * FROM tracking ORDER BY session_id, event_datetime DESC ) AS t INNER JOIN sessions AS s ON t.session_id = s.id ORDER BY t.event_datetime DESC;
